name: RIFT - Greathound Power Pack
detailed_description:
Ride into battle on the back of a hero’s best friend! In addition to a fearsome and loyal new mount, this pack also contains a pet and items intended to help you out as you journey through Telara.

INCLUDES:

  • Crimson Greathound Mount

  • Ascended Seal

  • Tropical Baby Budgling

  • Packmaster’s Reward Cache

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c, June 2010 update
  • Hard Drive: 15.0 GB available
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compliant card
  • Other: Broadband internet connection (DSL, cable modem or other high speed connection)
